attr_list.bmc_cmd: _rv=$(ipmitool fru print 1 2>/dev/null | tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f3-5 | grep 'Manufacturer') && echo $_rv || echo 'Manufacturer : N/A'
_rv=$(ipmitool fru print 1 2>/dev/null | grep 'Part Number'|| echo 'Part Number : N/A'); _rv2=$(echo $_rv | cut -d':' -f 2 | awk '{$1=$1};1'); echo 'Part Number : '$_rv2
_rv=$(ipmitool fru print 1 2>/dev/null | tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f3-5 | grep 'Serial') && echo $_rv || echo 'Serial : N/A'
_rv=$(ipmitool fru print 2 2>/dev/null | tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f3-5 | grep 'Manufacturer') && echo $_rv || echo 'Manufacturer : N/A'
_rv=$(ipmitool fru print 2 2>/dev/null | grep 'Part Number'|| echo 'Part Number : N/A'); _rv2=$(echo $_rv | cut -d':' -f 2 | awk '{$1=$1};1'); echo 'Part Number : '$_rv2
_rv=$(ipmitool fru print 2 2>/dev/null | tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f3-5 | grep 'Serial') && echo $_rv || echo 'Serial : N/A'
